attributes.action: UK Citizenship and Passport Revoked for UK Nationals who Leave to Fight for Terrorist Organisations
attributes.additional_details: Terrorism is growing throughout the world and poses a clear danger to our citizens. When UK Citizens who have for fought for extremists and terrorists return to the UK radicalised and ready to carry out acts of terror here, they are breaching the human rights of the citizens of this country. As such if UK citizens who leave the country to to fight for these organisations automatically have their citizenship and passport revoked, and re-entry to the country barred, then we are protecting our citizens.
